trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> and <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see langword="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" /> das classes <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> e <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> é criado quando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto gera o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the result of recognition, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o resultado de reconhecimento, acessar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propriedade no manipulador para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Emulation is the process by which text, instead of audio, is the input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Emulação de é o processo pelo qual o texto, em vez de áudio, é a entrada para um mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala.

trans-unit.source: To bypass the audio inputs for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object during emulation, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para ignorar as entradas de áudio para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto durante a emulação, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala encontra uma exceção durante a operação de reconhecimento, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> estiver definida como a exceção e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> está definida como `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir adiciona um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> evento para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.

trans-unit.source: The handler gets the recognized text from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador obtém o texto reconhecido do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the results of emulated recognition.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os resultados do reconhecimento emulado.

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or <see langword="null" /> if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Informações detalhadas sobre os resultados de reconhecimento, ou <see langword="null" /> se ocorreu um erro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> objeto derivado de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> e contém informações completas sobre uma frase retornada por uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter uma lista de todos os candidatos de reconhecimento de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se reconhecedor encontra uma exceção durante a operação de reconhecimento, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> estiver definida como a exceção e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> está definida como `null`.
